lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, a picture caption in some editions on Thursday with an article about preparations for rain at the United States Open golf tournament at Bethpage State Park misstated the date when the crews shown were removing water from the 18th green. They were pictured during the 2002 Open at Bethpage, not “earlier this week.”.
